What's new in DaVinci Resolve 10.1 Editing Updates Rich Text Title support 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Take Selector to preview and align multiple takes 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Copy timeline clips via Option + Drag 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ FCPX Import: Imports sync-audio as a compound clip 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ FCPX Import: Compound clips with single A/V elements are split into individual clips 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import font properties from FCP7 XML 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for timeline markers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for Generator sizing, cropping and composition Color Page Updates 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Copy and paste of Power Windows with metadata 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Additional highlight difference mode 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for rectangle patch size for monitor calibration 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Added monitor calibration support using SpectraCal CalMan 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ability to expand/collapse mark store groups from the BMD panel 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ability to add marks on mark store sub-groups 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Expanded preserve options in ColorTrace, Gallery and copy timeline grades Stereoscopic 3D Support Updates 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Single editable timeline containing both eyes 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Edit timeline eye selection for viewing 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Media Pool Left/Right clip syncing and split 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Media Pool eye selection for viewer, clip attributes and metadata 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for stereo track mattes 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Additional Media Pool columns to indicate stereo sync and linked audio offset 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Color page gang controls for floating windows 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Option of first or middle frame for auto colour and alignment processing 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ripple node labelling from one eye to the other 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Stereoscopic 3D filter options for convergence, auto-align, swapped media and floating windows 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Convergence for mono-clips, titles, mattes and node sizing General Enhancements Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for Final Cut Pro X 10.1 XML 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ability to add clips from folder and sub-folders to MediaPool with matching bins automatically created 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ability to ColorTrace all versions from source to target 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for trimming frame-based formats such as ARRIRAW, DPX and DNG 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for PSD frames 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for PNG frames
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for ARRI metadata 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for Canon C500 v1.1 IDTs 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sony MXF audio rendering 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for Avid FrameFlex 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Bitrate control for easyDCP renders 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Slate TC field editing in the media pool 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Additional DCI XYZ timeline colorspace option for JPEG2000 and easyDCP clips 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ General performance and stability improvements

Minimum system requirements 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Windows 7 Pro 64 bit with SP1 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 12 GB of system memory is recommended and 8 GB is the minimum supported 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Blackmagic Design Desktop Video version 9.7.7 or later
